faq.question: What is YelloPartner?
faq.answer: YelloPartner is the mobile app platform for vendors who would like to get listed in YelloChat. Through YelloPartner, vendor can do following: ZRegister account to list in for relevant business activities and manage subscriptions Deal with enquiries coming through YelloChat using a real time chat Post real time promotions anytime using a mobile phone with the app in it

faq.question: How to register with Yellopartner?
faq.answer: You need to register as a vendor in Yellopartner to get listed.  To Register you need to provide a valid active UAE mobile phone number. You need to verify the phone number by entering  the OTP you receive through SMS. You need to select the category of your business and join the groups related to your business services to complete your registration. Your registration will be verified by our team and upon acceptance you will be listed and published for the Yellochat users.   Do I need to provide Documents? You need to provide your business documents to do

YelloChat is an interactive business media in digital platform  in which vendors are listed in a respective category group to get all relevant enquiries generated by customers and deal with it using a real time chat directly. Vendors can also post real-time promotions to promote their business and get enquiry through that.
